text: 26.10: FG 9.14; 9.21; Ga 1.13Gu Zerusareman mba bigi ga muuŋgi. Gu Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani han zɨ bakɨme ndigap, Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrver farfav, mbe ndi bɨna suegi. Gu maaŋ mbuim, mba gumgir pani mbe shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzɨ zav nzuaim, gu vhɨra khaŋ nzuai, ‘Mbe vhɨzɨrga.’
